akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary of Defense may take such actions as the Secretary considers to be in the best interest of the Federal Government to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Authority for Contracts and Other Agreements Relating to Space Transportation Infrastructure.—

akn:content.akn:p: [(e) Repealed. Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 813(a)(2), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1851.]
(f) The Secretary of Defense shall prescribe regulations to carry out this section.
